data.text: @HMR812 @GMA @RobinRoberts @michaelstrahan Yes I saw all that but the fact of the matter is you can't hold white people to one standard and black people to another. If you're going to call on the whites then you have to call on the blacks. Period end of story that is how life becomes equal. Not all cops act that way.

@PANYGAFLgirl @GMA @RobinRoberts @michaelstrahan Clearly u missed the point of Blackish. The point was calling the police on black ppl for frivolous things can lead to ppl being killed. That’s why Dre went to talk to them becuz it was annoyance not life threatening. Then did u NOT see how the contrast was different with WP?
